applications.name: InfiniSleep
applications.shortDescription: A port of wasp-os's sleep tracker

watchfaces.name: Photo Face
watchfaces.description:
This watch face adds support for a custom background image via external resources.

To set a background image, upload a converted image named watchface.bin to a directory named gallery.

You can also customize text color and position by long pressing on the watch face.
watchfaces.shortDescription: Digital face with a user-set background image
